Name: Survivor Legends
About the game: About game Kill the swarming enemies and survive. This game have 14 skills, 67 special upgrades, 19 accessories, and 26 types of enemies. Enemies and obstacles are randomly generated every game. About me hello. To all of you who are playing the game on Steam and visiting this page. I am a newbie creator who started making games in February. And to present my first work to you, I am a little nervous and happy at the same time. If you can find even a little bit of fun while playing this game, I will be happy. With all my heart, Reno Games. Written with the help of Google Translator.
